# CYREXA 220mm CAPITAL MAIN BATTERY
A [color=gold]ballistic[/color] capital-class turret, firing a 220mm shell with insane power.
## Gun Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson] 7.5 RPM [/color]/[color=deepskyblue] 0.125 RPS [/color] - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]5000 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Muzzle Velocity: [color=orange]315 m/s[/color] - Range: [color=orange]1260m[/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=orange]1000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]60u/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]350u[/color]
